column5: I have a nice v rod in great shape minus te grip. It is pretty hard and very slick. Whats the best way to resurface it? I was going to sand it but not sure if this is the best way to fix it.
PM Spiel..once his Lakair hangover is gone I am sure he will have an answer
or just send him more booze and keep him sauced up with the hair of dog treatment.
i uses a mr.clean magic eraser on a couple of my rods worked pretty good at cleaning them up
